name: graviton
author: Jeremy Barnes
description: Spafax HUB media asset management software

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-react && npm run install-electron && npm run install-server
scripts.start: npm run start-react && npm run start-electron && npm run start-server
scripts.build: rm -rf build dist && mkdir "build/public" "dist/client" "dist/server/public" && npm run build-react && npm run build-electron && npm run build-server && electron-builder --publish=always
scripts.build-react: cd ./renderer && npm run build && cp -r ./public/static/* ../build/public && cp -r ./build/* ../dist/server/public
scripts.build-server: cd ./server && npm run build && cp -r ./build/* ../dist/server && rm -rf ../dist/server/public/static/serverNotFound.html ../dist/server/public/static/media/logo.svg
